title: League ScreenSaver

embed.description: League artwork finally arrives for your idle screen! You won't find any complicated steps or endless downloads here, just a simple way to create multiple customizable playlists from legions of League images and animations.

body: How do you use the LoL sceensaver? Ive downloaded but it ask for a "lol launcher". Please someone help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Looks like you're trying to run 'screensaver.exe' from inside the LoLScreenSaver\browser folder directly, which isn't the intended way to launch this tool.

Instead, open up your screensaver settings, select the league of legends screensaver and click the settings button to the right.
yeah i understand now. Thank you
